abstract: A debut puzzle from Michael Sharp gets the Rex Parker treatment.
snippet: A debut puzzle from Michael Sharp gets the Rex Parker treatment.
lead_paragraph: TUESDAY’S PUZZLE — We have a debut puzzle today from Prof. Michael Sharp, a new constructor from Binghamton, N.Y. I have an interview with him at the end of this post. Wait a second. Does that name sound familiar? It may well. Mr. Sharp is better known in the puzzle community by his alter ego, the blogger Rex Parker. Congratulations, Rex!
